page.title: 16FOXTON AT REST AND PLAY
page.content: People do a great number of things when not at work.Within the home the usual way of relaxing was to read a book,watch television,watch a film on the video or listen to the radio.Children spend most of their time playing with friends or watching T.V..Adults did grown up things like D.I.Y.,Gardening,Sewing,Knitting.There are no sports facilities in the villages but Gartree social club runs Karate classes,Athletics and has a rugby and football pitch where our dads play on a Saturday or Sunday. Although we're not supposed to some of us go swimming in the canal if it's hot.
